ProductInfo.Features:
Coomatec DVRCam dome is the first camera which include all-in-one security system. It can record without for an additional DVR system.
It is a real play and plug surveillance camera, easy to set up.
Only get the right time while connecting to your computer. It is a stand alone camera.
Bulit in Micro SD slot, 2GB-32GB volume is available, 32GB card can support up to 14 days circular recording. We provide a Micro SD card reader for free, you should buy Micro SD card by yourself.
8m night vision, F=3.6mm lens, widely used for home/office/shop/mall/warehouse/lobby.
ProductInfo.Name: Gadget Zone DVRCam Dome Real DVR CCTV Surveillance Camera Black Plug and Play Built-in 32GB Micro SD Slot with 8M Night Vision and 90 Degrees Diagonal View
